Description.Text: Zvezdnaya Hotel is a budget 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation in north Moscow. Highlights include a restaurant, a sauna, free Wi-Fi and a good location close to Ostankino Tower. The All-Russia Exhibition Centre is a grand, permanent trade show located in the north of Moscow, neighbouring the Moscow Botanical Garden of Academy of Sciences. Nearby places of interest include the 18th-century Ostankino Palace and Cosmonauts Alley, home to the Memorial Museum of Astronautics and the Monument to the Conquerors of Space. VDNKh and Alekseevskaya metro stations are located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Moscow destinations. The hotel occupies a high-rise building with a flat, light-coloured facade. Facilities include a beauty salon and a sauna. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are simply decorated with patterned fabrics and wood furniture. Amenities include air-conditioning, satellite TV, a fridge and an en-suite bathroom. The hotel restaurant serves Russian and European dishes, whilst guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
